title: Carrot and coriander soup
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) butter', '450g (1 lb) carrots, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '600ml (1 pt) vegetable stock', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 tablespoon fresh coriander', '150ml (1/4 pt) single cream', 'salt and pepper to taste']
